text: It Is Never Too Late to Mend is a 1913 American silent film version of the novel by Charles Reade. The film was released by the Edison Company. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1913 films Category:Films based on British novels Category:1913 short films Category:1913 drama films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films
title: It Is Never Too Late to Mend (1913 film)
